Codo » Index » Lemonette » AutoFillable

Class: Lemonette.AutoFillable

Defined in: app/scripts/application/shared/auto_fillable.coffee

Overview

Create an extension for views empower to the view to:

  • fill selects with collection name
  • fill related select
  • fill models from forms

Examples:


class Views.Filters extends Marionette.ItemView
  @include App.Shared.AutoFillable
  
  onRender: ->
    clients = App.collection('Clients')
    @fillSelect clients, 'client_id'

Instance Method Summary

  • # (void) fillRelation(collection, field_id, relation_id, event, relation_id_value, options = {})
  • # (void) fillSelect(collection, field_id, options = {})
  • # (void) createOptionsFromCollection(collection, field_id, options = {})
  • # (void) createOptions(field_id, values, selected_value = null, default_value = null, options = {})
  • # (void) fillModel(options = {}, skipValidation = false)
